Introduction

Junghoon is a South Korean singer under KQ Entertainment. He made his official debut on March 30, 2023, as the lead vocalist of the boy group xikers.

On May 5, 2023, it was announced that Junghoon would be going on hiatus to recover from surgery after tearing his cruciate ligament.
